text: John P. Schaefer is President Emeritus of the University of Arizona, where he had an active, 21-year career in teaching and research. He graduated from Brooklyn Technical High School and Polytechnic Institute of Brooklyn (now NYU Polytechnic School of Engineering).http://tucson.com/news/state-and- regional/history-and-culture/john-p-schaefer-remains-focused-on-myriad- tasks/article_acda756e-4d0a-56f9-aa7c-5b7d9d62149c.htmlhttp://directory.arizona.edu/buildings/john- p-schaefer-center-creative- photographyhttp://johnpschaefer.com/http://www.creativephotography.org/artists/john- p-schaeferhttp://uanews.org/story/former-ua-president-earns-founders- awardhttp://teoe.org/news/exposure-2013%E2%80%8F/http://www.arizonawildcats.com/ViewArticle.dbml?DB_OEM_ID=30700&ATCLID;=209336390http://teoe.org/news/dr- john-schaefer/ ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Polytechnic Institute of New York University alumni Category:Presidents of the University of Arizona Category:Brooklyn Technical High School alumni
title: John P. Schaefer
